hints.content:
Milan wants to collect $\purpleD{581}$ shells. He has already collected $\maroonD{363}$ shells, and he has not collected the rest yet.

![A tape diagram models that the 581 shells are equal to the 363 shells collected and the unknown number that are not collected yet.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a84ba02a18dfbacfe80f6bee0ea1b300afc5b6ba)

$\purpleD{581}-\maroonD{363}=\blueE{?}$

![Part 1 of 2. Place value blocks show 581 blocks with 363 blocks crossed out](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c5d43b697030955f9315b50a2ae1a564e0a22607)

![Part 2 of 2 of previous image.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c73e30a631949278caf9b3bebab093243e7fe487)
Milan wants to collect $\blueE{218}$ more shells.

question.content:
Milan has collected $363$ shells so far. He wants to collect $581$ shells in all. 

**How many more shells does Milan want?**

[[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] shells
